description: Irregular triangle T(n, j) giving in row n the positive integer areas of all non-right angle triangles (X(n)_j, Y(n)_j, Z(n)), with X(n)_j = sqrt(x(n)_j), Y(n)_j = sqrt(y(n)_j), and Z(n) = sqrt(z(n)), and positive integers 1 <= x(n)_j <= y(n)_j <= z(n), for j = 1, 2,..., A336886. hence z(n) = A334818(n), for n >= 1.
